title: HookFeedResponse
description: Detailed schema for a generated educational or informative feed item

headline.description: The main hook or title to catch the user's attention

hookText.description: A short, intriguing description expanding on the headline

analogy.description: A simple analogy to help users understand the concept

category.description: The primary category or domain this content belongs to (e.g., Science, History, Art)

tags.description: List of descriptive tags to help with discoverability

img_desc.description: A detailed prompt to generate a relevant image for this feed item

expandedContent.description: Expanded content with structured explanation and real-world connections

fullExplanation.description: A detailed explanation of the concept

mindBlowingFact.description: A surprising or impressive fact about the topic

realWorldConnection.description: Explanation of how the concept connects to the real world

relatedTopics.description: Related or follow-up topics for further exploration

sourceInfo.description: Technical metadata about the topic and generation

sonarTopicId.description: Unique identifier for the source or topic

generatedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed item was generated

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this content was created

saveCount.description: Number of times this item was saved

shareCount.description: Number of times this item was shared
